content:
protection
SP6 Reaction
1. At room temperature mix10mM nucleotides
0.5 ul 2mg/10X buffer
0.5 ul RNASIN
4 ul (400 Ci/mmole)
0.5 ul enzyme (SP6 or T7)
2. incubate 1 hr
Add 1 ul F20-1
10 mins 
3. Add 90 ui sterile H20
Phenol extract 1X
4. Add 10 ul sterile 3N Na Acetate and 2 vols Ethanol
precipitate
5. Resuspend in 200-400 ul sterile H20
10X Buffer
0.4 Tris 7.5
60 mM 
20 mM spermidine
H20 to 10 ml
